Farewell, My Turnabout









TranscriptPart 1

Part 2

Part 3

Part 4March 22, 9:47 AMDistrict CourtDefendant Lobby No. 3Engarde:
Adrian did it...?Phoenix:
...That's what it looks like.Engarde:
Dude, no way! That woman couldn't do anything like that.Phoenix:
In court today, there will be a mountain of evidence that will implicate you.Engarde:
A mountain of evidence...?Phoenix:
I'm certain there is someone out there trying very hard to pin this whole thing on you.Engarde:
Please, Mr. Lawyer! Dude, like I said yesterday... I'm "refreshing like a spring breeze", alright? I can't let any sort of scandal ruin that.Phoenix:
I understand...???:
Well, it's almost time.Phoenix:
Mia...Mia:
We must get a complete acquittal today.Phoenix:
I know... But I can't focus on Maya's situation right now. (Changed from [I can't focus on Maya's situation right now.] in the original release) ...Or Pearls' either. No matter what, I have to focus on winning this case by the end of the day!Mia:
Indeed. Well, let's get going!...*beep beep beep*...Phoenix:
(It's him!)...*beep*...Phoenix:
This is Wright!???:
Good morning. This is it, Mr. Attorney; the day of the trial.Phoenix:
Maya... She's unharmed, right!????:
Well... When I checked on her earlier this morning, she seemed a bit, how shall we say, tired.Phoenix:
...!???:
Don't worry. People don't die that easily. Besides, what you really should be concentrating on, is winning today's trial.Phoenix:
G...Grrrr...???:
For my sake, as well as yours, you must win today's trial. (Changed from [For myself, you must win today's trial.] in the original release) Which is why... I sent you a little present this morning.Phoenix:
Present? What in the world would you want to give me!????:
You'll figure it out once the trial starts... And even if you don't "like" my gift... (Changed from [You'll figure it out once the trial opens... even if you don't 'like' my gift...] in the original release) I expect you to graciously accept it, and win the day's contest... If you please.Phoenix:
Wait!...*beep*...Phoenix:
(The kidnapper sent me a "present"...?)Engarde:
Mr. Lawyer dude? Who was that...?Phoenix:
Ah, um... No one. It has nothing to do with you, so forget you heard anything!Engarde:
...Dude, did your nose just get longer?March 22, 10:00 AMDistrict CourtCourtroom No. 3Judge:
Court is now in session for the trial of Matt Engarde. Are the prosecution and defense ready?Phoenix:
The defense is ready, Your Honor.Judge:
... I say! Mr. Wright! What happened to Ms. von Karma!?Phoenix:
I-I don't know, Your Honor! (Why are you getting mad at me!?)Bailiff:
...Your Honor!Judge:
Please be quiet, bailiff. Court is in session. If you must tell me something, please keep it brief. Now then, what is it?Bailiff:
Prosecutor... Prosecutor von Karma has... This morning, Ms. von Karma was shot by an unknown gunman!Judge:
... WWWWWWWHAT!?Phoenix:
Sh-Shot!?Mia:
Somehow... I think this is the "present" that man was talking about.Phoenix:
His "present"...!Mia:
Ms. von Karma is one of the top prosecutors in the country at the moment. If she were to disappear... (Changed from [If she disappeared...] in the original release) it would be to your "advantage". (Changed from [This would be to your 'advantage'.] in the original release)Phoenix:
(Th-This... This is totally insane!) M-Ms. von Karma! Is she alright!?Judge:
I don't have that answer! ...???:
She's alive and in stable condition.Judge:
That's good... Phew. ... ...! Y-Y-You're...Phoenix:
(I thought he'd show up...)Edgeworth:
...Your Honor... Due to the circumstances, Ms. Franziska von Karma can not appear in court today. I, Miles Edgeworth, will be taking her place. The prosecution is ready... naturally.Edgeworth:
Ms. von Karma was shot in her right shoulder, and is currently undergoing surgery. Luckily, I have looked this case over and am familiar with the details. The prosecution seeks to prove the guilt of Mr. Matt Engarde.Judge:
Th-The court acknowledges the prosecution.Edgeworth:
...Wright. I finally found the answer I was struggling for on my long journey this past year. By the time this case comes to an end, you too, will know the answer.Phoenix:
...!Edgeworth:
Now then, the prosecution would like to call its first witness... Please bring Detective Gumshoe to the witness stand!Edgeworth:
Witness, your name and occupation.Gumshoe:
My name's Dick Gumshoe, sir. I'm a detective down at the precinct... for now.Judge:
"For now"...?Gumshoe:
After this trial's over... I'm supposed to turn in my badge, sir.Phoenix:
(D-Detective Gumshoe...)Edgeworth:
The prosecution has no need for a depressed witness. Lift your head up and face forward like a proud officer, Detective Dick Gumshoe!Gumshoe:
Y-Yes, sir!Edgeworth:
Now, let's have your testimony. If we want to explore the various facets of this case, we must start with that.Mia:
Get ready, Phoenix. This is going to be one very rough fight.Phoenix:
Yeah... It would have to be with Edgeworth as my opponent.  (The answer he was "struggling" for... Interesting... Show me this "answer" you finally found, Edgeworth...)Witness Testimony-- Bare Facts of the Case --Gumshoe:
This murder happened after the Hero of Heroes award ceremony, sir.
The victim, Juan Corrida, was found dead in his hotel room.
After looking into the cause of death, we believe he was definitely murdered, sir.
At first, we thought there was something suspicious about the empty guitar case.
However, we later found out that the guitar case had nothing to do with the murder.Judge:
Hmm... After the award ceremony ended, the victim was alone in his room...?Gumshoe:
Yes, sir! Both the victim and defendant went alone to their rooms, sir.Judge:
I see. Mr. Wright, you may begin your cross-examination.Cross Examination

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin. A channeling prodigy with intense spiritual power. Also the youngest.

characters.name: Will Powers
characters.description1: Was the Steel Samurai. His face is a bit intimidating, so he's got hard luck in showbiz.

characters.name: Security Lady
characters.description1: Member of hotel security. I'm pretty sure her real name is Wendy Oldbag.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: Claims to be an investigative photographer. Latest field: the seedy world of tabloids.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Juan Corrida
characters.description1: The victim. A young star who played the Jammin' Ninja. Was on bad terms with Engarde.

characters.name: Matt Engarde
characters.description1: Popular young actor who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.
characters.description2: My client. A hot-shot star who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.

characters.name: Adrian Andrews
characters.description1: Engarde's manager. An intelligent woman who seems to have it all together.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: A prosecutor in Germany since age 13, she has come to America to defeat me in court.

characters.name: Celeste Inpax
characters.description1: Was Andrews' mentor and Corrida's manager. Killed herself two years ago.
characters.description2: Killed herself two years ago. Was Corrida's manager and fiancée, and Andrews' mentor.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: A gifted prosecutor. He disappeared suddenly a year ago.

characters.name: John Doe
characters.description1: The butler of Engarde Mansion. But for some reason, I get the feeling we've met before...

characters.name: Shelly de Killer
characters.description1: A professional assassin. Always leaves a Shelly card near his victim's body.

evidence_objects.name: Attorney's Badge
evidence_objects.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.

evidence_objects.name: Maya's Magatama
evidence_objects.description1: Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.

evidence_objects.name: The Nickel Samurai
evidence_objects.description1: A glossy photo Maya pushed onto me. Click here for details.

evidence_objects.name: Press Conference Ticket
evidence_objects.description1: Seems like the Nickel Samurai is to confess something after the post-ceremony stage show.

evidence_objects.name: Radio Transceiver
evidence_objects.description1: Originally from the Bellboy. It can transmit and receive signals over great distances.
evidence_objects.description2: Originally from Maya's kidnapper, who goes by the name of "De Killer".

evidence_objects.name: Lotta's Camera
evidence_objects.description1: A very expensive item valued at $1,600. It was stolen around the time of the murder.
evidence_objects.description2: Stolen on the night of the murder. Tabloid article about the victim was in the case.

evidence_objects.name: Hotel Guidemap
evidence_objects.description1: Map of the Gatewater Hotel around the crime scene. Click here for details.

evidence_objects.name: Guitar Case
evidence_objects.description1: Found next to the victim. Empty. There is some water, but only on top of the lid.
evidence_objects.description2: Empty. There is some water, but only on top of the lid. Bears Corrida's fingerprints.

evidence_objects.name: Wine Glass
evidence_objects.description1: Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. No sign it's been drank.
evidence_objects.description2: Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. Bears Andrews' fingerprints.

evidence_objects.name: Crime Photo
evidence_objects.description1: Photo of Juan Corrida's murder scene. Click here for details.

evidence_objects.name: Autograph
evidence_objects.description1: Juan Corrida's autograph. "To my dearest Wendy" is written on it.

evidence_objects.name: Magazine Clipping
evidence_objects.description1: An "article" from the tabloid "Gossip Land". Click here for details.

evidence_objects.name: Suicide Report
evidence_objects.description1: Deceased: Celeste InpaxFound by: Juan CorridaWas her suicide note hidden?

evidence_objects.name: Attempted Suicide Report
evidence_objects.description1: Attempter: Adrian AndrewsReason: Shock from Celeste Inpax's suicide.

evidence_objects.name: Juan's Autopsy Report
evidence_objects.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidence_objects.description1: Time of death: 8:15 PMCause: Strangled with a scarf, then stabbed with a knife.

evidence_objects.name: Knife
evidence_objects.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidence_objects.description1: Bears the victim's blood and Engarde's fingerprints. In the grip, "Gatewater" is engraved.

evidence_objects.name: Jammin' Ninja's Button
evidence_objects.description1: Was ripped from his costume. Is covered in Corrida's blood. Found in Engarde's "hakama".

evidence_objects.name: Lotta's Photo
evidence_objects.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Miles Edgeworth.
evidence_objects.description1: Picture taken in the Hallway right after the murder. Click here for details.

evidence_objects.name: Picture Card
evidence_objects.description1: Was placed next to the victim at the time of the murder. Ms. Andrews was carrying it.

evidence_objects.name: Letter of Introduction
evidence_objects.description1: Received from Edgeworth. Allows bearer to freely investigate the crime scene.

evidence_objects.name: Matt's Note
evidence_objects.description1: "Please feed my cat, Shoe. My house is just a little ways down from the hotel."

evidence_objects.name: Spy Camera
evidence_objects.description1: Set to record the victim's room from 8 PM for 1 hour. Was running at time of murder.

evidence_objects.name: Transmitter
evidence_objects.description1: Changes the footage taken by the spy camera into radio waves and transmits the data.

evidence_objects.name: Stuffed Bear
evidence_objects.description1: The spy camera was set in its right eye. Found in the victim's room.

evidence_objects.name: Credit Card Receipt
evidence_objects.description1: A receipt for $3,800. Proof Engarde bought a stuffed bear identical to one in evidence.

evidence_objects.name: Figurine
evidence_objects.obtained: Retrieved from Engarde Mansion - Living Room.
evidence_objects.description1: A wooden bear-shaped figurine. It's covered in many thin cuts.
evidence_objects.description2: A wooden puzzle with a hollow inside. Only Corrida and Andrews know how to open it.

evidence_objects.name: Celeste's Photo
evidence_objects.obtained: Retrieved from Engarde Mansion - Wine Cellar.
evidence_objects.description1: Found at Engarde Mansion. "With Love... Celeste" is written on it.

evidence_objects.name: Celeste's Suicide Note
evidence_objects.description1: Found inside the Figurine. It tells of Engarde's horrible misdeeds.

evidence_objects.name: Pistol
evidence_objects.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidence_objects.description1: <if not asked for details> One of the items retrieved from De Killer's hideout. Nothing else is known.  <if asked for details> A small caliber pistol that is thought to have been fired by De Killer at Franziska.

evidence_objects.name: Video Tape
evidence_objects.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidence_objects.description1: <if not asked for details> One of the items retrieved from De Killer's hideout. Nothing else is known.  <if asked for details> One of the items retrieved. De Killer violently tried to recover it. Contents unknown.

evidence_objects.name: Bellboy's Uniform
evidence_objects.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidence_objects.description1: <if not asked for details> One of the items retrieved from De Killer's hideout. Nothing else is known.<if asked for details> Worn by De Killer on the night of the murder. One of its special buttons is missing.

evidence_objects.name: Whip
evidence_objects.description1: Thrown away by Franziska von Karma, it has a certain mysterious nostalgia to it.

Would you please give us a brief timeline of what happened after the ceremony?

OK, pal. The ceremony started at 6 PM. It ended around 8 PM... and then there was a short break. A special post-ceremony show was supposed to start in the lobby 30 minutes later.
Phoenix:
And that's when the victim's body was found, correct?
Edgeworth:
Which is to say, the murder occurred during that thirty minute break period.
Judge:
Hmm... Please continue with your testimony, Detective.Gumshoe:
The victim, Juan Corrida, was found dead in his hotel room.Press







Phoenix:

Phoenix:
The person who discovered the victim's body was Adrian Andrews, correct?
Gumshoe:
...Yeah.
Judge:
Who is this "Adrian Andrews" you're talking about?
Gumshoe:
She's the defendant, Matt Engarde's, manager. She's a really pretty lady... sir.
Judge:
Ah, so she's a pretty lady... I wonder if she will grace us with her presence...
Gumshoe:
When the post-ceremony show was about to start, she went to get Mr. Engarde. After visiting his room, she next went to the victim's room to get him for the show, sir.

I see... And that's when she found the victim's body...Gumshoe:
After looking into the cause of death, we believe he was definitely murdered, sir.Press

Mmm... "Banana"...
Gumshoe:
Um, his "bandana", sir... That's the thing wrapped tightly around his neck, sir.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin. A channeling prodigy with intense spiritual power. Also the youngest.

characters.name: Will Powers
characters.description1: Was the Steel Samurai. His face is a bit intimidating, so he's got hard luck in showbiz.

characters.name: Security Lady
characters.description1: Member of hotel security. I'm pretty sure her real name is Wendy Oldbag.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: Claims to be an investigative photographer. Latest field: the seedy world of tabloids.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Juan Corrida
characters.description1: The victim. A young star who played the Jammin' Ninja. Was on bad terms with Engarde.

characters.name: Matt Engarde
characters.description1: Popular young actor who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.
characters.description2: My client. A hot-shot star who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.

characters.name: Adrian Andrews
characters.description1: Engarde's manager. An intelligent woman who seems to have it all together.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: A prosecutor in Germany since age 13, she has come to America to defeat me in court.

characters.name: Celeste Inpax
characters.description1: Was Andrews' mentor and Corrida's manager. Killed herself two years ago.
characters.description2: Killed herself two years ago. Was Corrida's manager and fiancée, and Andrews' mentor.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: A gifted prosecutor. He disappeared suddenly a year ago.

characters.name: John Doe
characters.description1: The butler of Engarde Mansion. But for some reason, I get the feeling we've met before...

characters.name: Shelly de Killer
characters.description1: A professional assassin. Always leaves a Shelly card near his victim's body.

evidence_objects.description2: Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. Bears Andrews' fingerprints.

testimonies.testimony: Matt Engarde and Juan Corrida were huge rivals with each other.
They each thought the other guy was "in his way". That's motive enough in my book.
As for evidence... There's the Jammin' Ninja's button.
It was ripped off of the ninja costume and was found in Mr. Engarde's "hakama".
The defendant's fingerprints were also all over the knife.
The defendant bought the knife for the crime... Which makes this a premeditated murder!

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin. A channeling prodigy with intense spiritual power. Also the youngest.

characters.name: Will Powers
characters.description1: Was the Steel Samurai. His face is a bit intimidating, so he's got hard luck in showbiz.

characters.name: Security Lady
characters.description1: Member of hotel security. I'm pretty sure her real name is Wendy Oldbag.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: Claims to be an investigative photographer. Latest field: the seedy world of tabloids.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Juan Corrida
characters.description1: The victim. A young star who played the Jammin' Ninja. Was on bad terms with Engarde.

characters.name: Matt Engarde
characters.description1: Popular young actor who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.
characters.description2: My client. A hot-shot star who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.

characters.name: Adrian Andrews
characters.description1: Engarde's manager. An intelligent woman who seems to have it all together.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: A prosecutor in Germany since age 13, she has come to America to defeat me in court.

characters.name: Celeste Inpax
characters.description1: Was Andrews' mentor and Corrida's manager. Killed herself two years ago.
characters.description2: Killed herself two years ago. Was Corrida's manager and fiancée, and Andrews' mentor.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: A gifted prosecutor. He disappeared suddenly a year ago.

characters.name: John Doe
characters.description1: The butler of Engarde Mansion. But for some reason, I get the feeling we've met before...

characters.name: Shelly de Killer
characters.description1: A professional assassin. Always leaves a Shelly card near his victim's body.

evidence_objects.name: Attorney's Badge
evidence_objects.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.

evidence_objects.name: Maya's Magatama
evidence_objects.description1: Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.

evidence_objects.name: The Nickel Samurai
evidence_objects.description1: A glossy photo Maya pushed onto me. Click here for details.

evidence_objects.name: Press Conference Ticket
evidence_objects.description1: Seems like the Nickel Samurai is to confess something after the post-ceremony stage show.

evidence_objects.name: Radio Transceiver
evidence_objects.description1: Originally from the Bellboy. It can transmit and receive signals over great distances.
evidence_objects.description2: Originally from Maya's kidnapper, who goes by the name of "De Killer".

evidence_objects.name: Lotta's Camera
evidence_objects.description1: A very expensive item valued at $1,600. It was stolen around the time of the murder.
evidence_objects.description2: Stolen on the night of the murder. Tabloid article about the victim was in the case.

evidence_objects.name: Hotel Guidemap
evidence_objects.description1: Map of the Gatewater Hotel around the crime scene. Click here for details.

evidence_objects.name: Guitar Case
evidence_objects.description1: Found next to the victim. Empty. There is some water, but only on top of the lid.
evidence_objects.description2: Empty. There is some water, but only on top of the lid. Bears Corrida's fingerprints.

evidence_objects.name: Wine Glass
evidence_objects.description1: Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. No sign it's been drank.
evidence_objects.description2: Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. Bears Andrews' fingerprints.

evidence_objects.name: Crime Photo
evidence_objects.description1: Photo of Juan Corrida's murder scene. Click here for details.

evidence_objects.name: Autograph
evidence_objects.description1: Juan Corrida's autograph. "To my dearest Wendy" is written on it.

evidence_objects.name: Magazine Clipping
evidence_objects.description1: An "article" from the tabloid "Gossip Land". Click here for details.

evidence_objects.name: Suicide Report
evidence_objects.description1: Deceased: Celeste InpaxFound by: Juan CorridaWas her suicide note hidden?

evidence_objects.name: Attempted Suicide Report
evidence_objects.description1: Attempter: Adrian AndrewsReason: Shock from Celeste Inpax's suicide.

evidence_objects.name: Juan's Autopsy Report
evidence_objects.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidence_objects.description1: Time of death: 8:15 PMCause: Strangled with a scarf, then stabbed with a knife.

evidence_objects.name: Knife
evidence_objects.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidence_objects.description1: Bears the victim's blood and Engarde's fingerprints. In the grip, "Gatewater" is engraved.

evidence_objects.name: Jammin' Ninja's Button
evidence_objects.description1: Was ripped from his costume. Is covered in Corrida's blood. Found in Engarde's "hakama".

evidence_objects.name: Lotta's Photo
evidence_objects.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Miles Edgeworth.
evidence_objects.description1: Picture taken in the Hallway right after the murder. Click here for details.

evidence_objects.name: Picture Card
evidence_objects.description1: Was placed next to the victim at the time of the murder. Ms. Andrews was carrying it.

evidence_objects.name: Letter of Introduction
evidence_objects.description1: Received from Edgeworth. Allows bearer to freely investigate the crime scene.

evidence_objects.name: Matt's Note
evidence_objects.description1: "Please feed my cat, Shoe. My house is just a little ways down from the hotel."

evidence_objects.name: Spy Camera
evidence_objects.description1: Set to record the victim's room from 8 PM for 1 hour. Was running at time of murder.

evidence_objects.name: Transmitter
evidence_objects.description1: Changes the footage taken by the spy camera into radio waves and transmits the data.

evidence_objects.name: Stuffed Bear

evidence_objects.name: Credit Card Receipt

evidence_objects.description2: A wooden puzzle with a hollow inside. Only Corrida and Andrews know how to open it.

evidence_objects.obtained: Retrieved from Engarde Mansion - Wine Cellar.
evidence_objects.description1: Found at Engarde Mansion. "With Love... Celeste" is written on it.

evidence_objects.name: Celeste's Suicide Note

testimonies.testimony: Engarde... Engarde... Yes, now I remember!
The Nickel Samurai, that's right, it was the Nickel Samurai that I saw!
Yes, it would have been convenient for him to wear his costume during the murder.
He had to go to that post-ceremony stage show right after the crime, you know.
So he must've worn that Nickel Samurai costume when he was stabbing poor Juan.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin. A channeling prodigy with intense spiritual power. Also the youngest.

characters.name: Will Powers
characters.description1: Was the Steel Samurai. His face is a bit intimidating, so he's got hard luck in showbiz.

characters.name: Security Lady
characters.description1: Member of hotel security. I'm pretty sure her real name is Wendy Oldbag.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: Claims to be an investigative photographer. Latest field: the seedy world of tabloids.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Juan Corrida
characters.description1: The victim. A young star who played the Jammin' Ninja. Was on bad terms with Engarde.

characters.name: Matt Engarde
characters.description1: Popular young actor who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.
characters.description2: My client. A hot-shot star who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.

characters.name: Adrian Andrews
characters.description1: Engarde's manager. An intelligent woman who seems to have it all together.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: A prosecutor in Germany since age 13, she has come to America to defeat me in court.

characters.name: Celeste Inpax
characters.description1: Was Andrews' mentor and Corrida's manager. Killed herself two years ago.
characters.description2: Killed herself two years ago. Was Corrida's manager and fiancée, and Andrews' mentor.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: A gifted prosecutor. He disappeared suddenly a year ago.

characters.name: John Doe
characters.description1: The butler of Engarde Mansion. But for some reason, I get the feeling we've met before...

characters.name: Shelly de Killer
characters.description1: A professional assassin. Always leaves a Shelly card near his victim's body.

evidence_objects.description2: Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. Bears Andrews' fingerprints.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin. A channeling prodigy with intense spiritual power. Also the youngest.

characters.name: Will Powers
characters.description1: Was the Steel Samurai. His face is a bit intimidating, so he's got hard luck in showbiz.

characters.name: Security Lady
characters.description1: Member of hotel security. I'm pretty sure her real name is Wendy Oldbag.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: Claims to be an investigative photographer. Latest field: the seedy world of tabloids.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Juan Corrida
characters.description1: The victim. A young star who played the Jammin' Ninja. Was on bad terms with Engarde.

characters.name: Matt Engarde
characters.description1: Popular young actor who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.
characters.description2: My client. A hot-shot star who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.

characters.name: Adrian Andrews
characters.description1: Engarde's manager. An intelligent woman who seems to have it all together.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: A prosecutor in Germany since age 13, she has come to America to defeat me in court.

characters.name: Celeste Inpax
characters.description1: Was Andrews' mentor and Corrida's manager. Killed herself two years ago.
characters.description2: Killed herself two years ago. Was Corrida's manager and fiancée, and Andrews' mentor.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: A gifted prosecutor. He disappeared suddenly a year ago.

characters.name: John Doe
characters.description1: The butler of Engarde Mansion. But for some reason, I get the feeling we've met before...

characters.name: Shelly de Killer
characters.description1: A professional assassin. Always leaves a Shelly card near his victim's body.

testimonies.testimony: From the moment I saw the crime scene, I had a feeling that Matt was the murderer.
Matt had to kill Juan no matter what.
I know what his motive was. ...But I don't have any way to prove I'm right.
And he didn't have an alibi for what he was doing at the time of the murder.
My thoughts were confirmed by the evidence, of course; the button and the knife...
That button was torn off of Juan during his fight with Matt.
But I'm Matt's manager... So I felt that I had to protect him...

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin. A channeling prodigy with intense spiritual power. Also the youngest.

characters.name: Will Powers
characters.description1: Was the Steel Samurai. His face is a bit intimidating, so he's got hard luck in showbiz.

characters.name: Security Lady
characters.description1: Member of hotel security. I'm pretty sure her real name is Wendy Oldbag.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: Claims to be an investigative photographer. Latest field: the seedy world of tabloids.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Juan Corrida
characters.description1: The victim. A young star who played the Jammin' Ninja. Was on bad terms with Engarde.

characters.name: Matt Engarde
characters.description1: Popular young actor who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.
characters.description2: My client. A hot-shot star who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.

characters.name: Adrian Andrews
characters.description1: Engarde's manager. An intelligent woman who seems to have it all together.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: A prosecutor in Germany since age 13, she has come to America to defeat me in court.

characters.name: Celeste Inpax
characters.description1: Was Andrews' mentor and Corrida's manager. Killed herself two years ago.
characters.description2: Killed herself two years ago. Was Corrida's manager and fiancée, and Andrews' mentor.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: A gifted prosecutor. He disappeared suddenly a year ago.

characters.name: John Doe
characters.description1: The butler of Engarde Mansion. But for some reason, I get the feeling we've met before...

characters.name: Shelly de Killer
characters.description1: A professional assassin. Always leaves a Shelly card near his victim's body.

testimonies.testimony: When I first saw him... I really thought he had fainted. Honest.
When I realized he was dead... That was when I formulated my plan.
Once I made sure there was no one in the hallway, I made a dash back to Matt's room.
And then... I stabbed Juan's dead body with the knife, and ripped off the button.
Just when I finished and was returning to Matt's room... I had a bit of an inconvenience.
And that's why... That's why I ended up using the Nickel Samurai costume.
